title: Advanced Mathematics Learning Program Based on Online Content

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: A program for mid-level professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to strengthen mathematical thinking required for work application, with a focus on improving problem-solving skills through self-directed learning and peer collaboration in digital device-provided environments

learning_goals: Learners can present three or more strategies for applying mathematical theories to real-world business cases using online content and provided guidelines.
Learners can resolve more than 90% of questions arising during the content comprehension process through communication with peer learners and experts.
At the end of the course, learners can specifically design practical problem-solving solutions using mathematical modeling through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
